snippet.name: Salutation_Regex
snippet.starttext: <property name="Salutation"> <rule type="required" contexts="Profile" /> <rule type="regex" failureMessage="Only Dr, Prof, Mr, Mrs, Ms, or Miss (with or without a period) are allowed."> <param Regex="^(Dr|Prof|Mr|Mrs|Ms|Miss)(\.)?$" /> </rule> </property>
